root.description: The key fits and the bonds open.

exit.onCheck: Though freedom stand outside the [gate], a sense of fear attempt to stop you from passing through.

prop.description: A [table] is pushed against one of the walls. It is covered with various items.
prop.onCheck: On the [table] rest various items of little importance.
Geralt: "What a curse is on this [whip]! Almost I used it to further torture this tortured soul."

character.description: [Joss] catches his [mother] as she begins to slump down when the bonds release her.
character.onCheck: He holds up his [mother]'s weight, her arm pulled over his shoulders.
character.onTalk: Joss: "My [mother] is weak. We must get her home so she can rest."

character.onCheck: Her wrists are raw and bruised. She can hardly keep her eyes open.
